TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextView extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.PagedControl

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")]

[<System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")>]

summary.span: 提供用于显示大量文本的可编程控件，并带有用于移动页的可选标记。

span.span: Provides a programmable control for displaying larger amounts of text, with optional markup tags on a mobile page.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与移动窗体中的文本不同，您可以从代码中设置的内容 。Unlike literal text in a mobile form, you can set content of a from code. 与移动 控件不同，可以在属性的值中包含标记 。Unlike a mobile control, you can include markup within the value of the property. 此外， 控件应注意不会在分页过程中拆分插入的元素（如链接）。Also, the control is careful not to break up inserted elements such as links during pagination. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [窗体标记内的文本文本](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/16khc3tx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Literal Text Inside Form Markup](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/16khc3tx(v=vs.100)). 如果 控件在中，则 将属性设置 为，以允许在 `true` 移动设备上的多个页面间流动文本。If the control is within a , set the property to `true` to allow text to flow across multiple pages on mobile devices. 如果 控件不在中 ，请将该控件的名称放在 属性中 。If the control is not in a , put the name of the control into the property. 移动控件的大多数其他属性和方法 更适用于新设备适配器的开发人员，用于呈现特定设备上的内容。Most other properties and methods of the mobile control are of more use to developers of new device adapters for rendering the contents on specific devices. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [保护标准控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100))， [如何：通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100))，并 [在 ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100))来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100)), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100)), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建数字并标识句子中的每个质数，并将这些句子添加到 控件中。The following code example creates numbers and identifies each prime number in a sentence, and adds those sentences to the control. 该示例还使用自定义分页，一次只提供一页文本。The example also uses custom pagination to provide only a page full of text at a time. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileTextViewSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTextViewSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileTextViewSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTextViewSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

span.span: The number of items displayed per page after pagination.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自定义设备适配器的开发人员使用属性呈现内容。The property is used by developers of custom device adapters for rendering the contents. 如果为零，则分页不受此属性的影响。If zero, pagination is not affected by this property. 如果为非零值，则会在对窗体进行分页时覆盖每页显示的项。If nonzero, overrides items displayed per page when the form is paginated. 默认值为零。The default value is zero. 支持内部分页的移动控件还提供一种称为自定义分页的功能。Mobile controls that support internal pagination also provide a feature called custom pagination. 通常，此类控件要求您向它们提供其可以显示的所有数据。Normally, such controls require you to provide them all the data that they can display. 开发人员指定属性中列表的总项数 。Developers specify the total number of items that are in the list in the property. 属性指定控件每页显示的项数。The property specifies how many items the control displays per page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置每个回发的项数。The following code example sets the number of items for each postback. 此示例是类概述的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example for the class overview. [!code-csharp[MobileTextViewSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTextViewSample/cs/Default.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[MobileTextViewSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTextViewSample/vb/Default.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LoadItems As LoadItemsEventHandler

summary.span: 在控件自定义分页且需要更多数据时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a control is custom-paginated and needs more data.

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件是自定义分页的，则不会显式绑定控件。When control is custom-paginated, you do not explicitly bind the control. 分页后，控件引发此事件，指示需要数据的哪些部分。After pagination, the control raises this event, indicating what part of the data is required. 应用程序可以处理此事件，并将控件绑定到所需的数据。The application can handle this event and bind the control with the required data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义分页并调用 方法以在每页上加载指定数量的项。The following code example demonstrates how to create custom pagination and call the method to load a specified number of items per page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileTextViewSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTextViewSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileTextViewSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTextViewSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

The text for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关标记 (例如 \ 其属性中支持的) 的信息 ，请参阅 类讨论。For information about the tags (such as \) that supports in its property, see the class discussion. 可以通过使用 `Text` 属性或内部文本来指定属性。The property can be specified by using the `Text` attribute, or as inner text. 如果 以这两种方式指定了属性，则内部文本始终优先。If the property is specified in both ways, the inner text always takes precedence. 但是，如果 以编程方式设置该属性，则会自动删除内部文本，并优先使用新设置。However, if the property is programmatically set, the inner text is automatically removed and the new setting takes precedence.

span.span: Introduction to the TextView Control
